segments.text: I see the sink area first, with the faucet pouring water endlessly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The basin is full, overflowing in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's drenching the cabinet doors and pooling on the tiles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, drying a plate, oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she doesn't react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked nearby, waiting to be put away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, the garden looks serene and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now looking left, the cabinets are open with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is balancing precariously on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies, plate in the other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands below, reaching for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're coordinating this little theft so quietly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't look away from the potential mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
